markdown:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [What are the GCash Borrow Load fees I need to know about?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40476455413017-What-are-the-GCash-Borrow-Load-fees-I-need-to-know-about)
- [I have a concern with GCash Borrow Load. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40476345424153-I-have-a-concern-with-GCash-Borrow-Load-What-do-I-do)
- [How can I repay my GCash Borrow Load?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40476168459929-How-can-I-repay-my-GCash-Borrow-Load)
- [What are the GCash Borrow Load promos available?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40475956597017-What-are-the-GCash-Borrow-Load-promos-available)
- [Can I borrow load on GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40475792516377-Can-I-borrow-load-on-GCash)
- [I canceled my Borrow Load transaction but it still pushed through. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40475592668441-I-canceled-my-Borrow-Load-transaction-but-it-still-pushed-through-What-do-I-do)
- [GCash Borrow Load](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/8934604455065-GCash-Borrow-Load)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

If your Borrow Load transaction pushed through successfully, you will not be able to cancel it or change the mobile number in the transaction and GCash won’t be able to refund you for the transaction. However, you may choose to close your load loan in advance by paying for your total amount due.

**Note:** Fees included in the transaction, including your one-time processing fee, is non-refundable. To avoid this scenario, it is advisable that you double-check all the details in your Borrow Load contract before confirming your transaction.

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [I didn't receive my telco or non-telco load. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30281038586649)
- [I bought load on GCash but entered the wrong number or details. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30281882432281)
- [I was charged multiple times when I bought load on GCash. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30281393343769)
